[[inst_ldi_u]]
==== LDI.U

*Syntax:* ldi.u [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 64-bit doubleword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ldi_u.svg[LDI.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/UNSCALED
